triples.name: Rough set
triples.relevance: Rough set theory provides the foundational framework that the paper extends to handle interval-valued data.

triples.name: Dominance-based rough set approach
triples.relevance: The paper extends dominance-based rough set methods to handle interval-valued ordered decision systems.

triples.name: Feature selection
triples.relevance: The paper proposes new interval dominance-based feature selection algorithms and rules for interval-valued ordered data.

triples.name: Interval (mathematics)
triples.relevance: Interval representation is the core data structure used to handle multivalued ordered data in the proposed approach.

triples.name: List of datasets for machine-learning research
triples.relevance: The paper uses 12 datasets from the UCI repository for experimental validation of the proposed methods.
